text:
This patch updates the versions of avalon-framework, jakarta-oro and logkit, 
as well as adding three new libraries: velocity, xalan, xercesImpl and xml-apis
creator: tjsb@slb.com
tjsb@slb.com
text:
Created attachment 6930
Replaces previous patch, which incorrectly added non-build jars

Sorry, realised initial patch was wrong - should not have included the extra 
jars as they are not needed for building JMeter.
creator: tjsb@slb.com
